content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw;


create or alter PROCEDURE silver.usp_taxi_zone
AS
begin
if object_id('silver.taxi_zone') is not null drop  EXTERNAL table silver.taxi_zone;
create external table silver.taxi_zone
with (
    data_source=nyc_taxi_src,
    location='silver/taxi_zone',
    file_format=parquet_file_format
)
AS
select * from bronze.taxi_zone;
 end
